title: Pixel 4 swipe navigation while gaming
content:
Hi. I have a problem.

On my fantastic Pixel 4 I use the swipe navigation. It's great and k Don't want to change it.

However, when I play games.. I notice that I sometimes accidentally activate the back button. It's a swipe from the left or right of the screen.

Is there any way I can temporarily disable while playing games? My old Samsung had a games launcher app where you could control settings for games only.

I've tried 3rd party apps but nothing helps.

Any advice please?
